items.title: Weergaloze Garc√≠a doet Mbapp√© met hattrick voor even vergeten bij Real Madrid
items.summary: Real Madrid is het nieuwe jaar voortreffelijk gestart. Dat komt voor een groot deel door Gonzalo Garc√≠a, die de geblesseerde Kylian Mbapp√© met verve verving tegen Real Betis. De 21-jarige spits was goed voor een hattrick in het met 5-1 gewonnen duel.

items.title: 'I will do my job for 18 months and then we move on' - Amorim
items.summary: Manchester United manager Ruben Amorim says in his press conference that in 18 months' time, when his contract is due to end, he will leave the club, repeatedly stating that he came to "manage" the club, not just to be a coach.

items.title: Fulham 2-2 Liverpool, Morocco v Tanzania and more: clockwatch ‚Äì live
items.summary: Everton 2-4 Brentford, Tottenham 1-1 Sunderland Manchester City v Chelsea ‚Äì live | Email Tom With Portsmouth v Ipswich postponed, a win for Middlesbrough will see them go up to second in the Championship and six points behind Coventry. That Birmingham v Coventry game was a wild ride. Five goals, one red card and at the end of it the league leaders lose their second game in three. Continue reading...

items.title: Gakpo ziet heldenrol bij Liverpool door vingers glippen na spectaculair slot
Brian Brobbey salvages Sunderland point to increase heat on Frank at Tottenham
items.summary: Boos are becoming an increasingly frequent fixture at the end of Tottenham games. After travelling supporters had voiced their anger at the goalless draw at Brentford on Thursday, it was the home fans‚Äô turn to vent their frustrations after a result against Sunderland that could easily have been worse. After a promising first-half display and Ben Davies‚Äô opener, this draw will be even more disappointing for Thomas Frank having seen how his team were outplayed after the break by a Sunderland team still heavily depleted by players away on international duty. Brian Brobbey‚Äôs 80th-minute equaliser came at a time when the visitors were considerably the better side and perhaps looked like taking all three points. Continue reading...

items.title: Galaxy star Riqui Puig out until '27 after setback
items.summary: LA Galaxy star Riqui Puig's return from injury has been delayed until 2027, the LA Galaxy said Saturday after confirming that the midfielder underwent another anterior cruciate ligament reconstructive surgery on his left knee.

items.title: Amorim hits out: I'm Utd manager, not the coach
items.summary: Ruben Amorim has raised doubts over his future at Manchester United by saying he wants to be the "manager, not the coach."

items.title: Aaronson scores as Leeds hold Man United
items.summary: Matheus Cunha cancelled out Brenden Aaronson's strike as Ruben Amorim's Manchester United and rivals Leeds fought out a tense 1-1 draw at rocking Elland Road.

items.title: Rice on Gy√∂keres: Wouldn't be top without him
items.summary: Declan Rice has defended goal-shy Viktor Gy√∂keres, claiming Arsenal will not be able to end their 22-year wait for a Premier League title without him.

items.title: Premier League live updates: Liverpool take late lead at Fulham
Manchester City v Chelsea: Premier League ‚Äì live
items.summary: Updates from 5.30pm (GMT) kick-off at the Etihad Clockwatch: Fulham v Liverpool, Afcon and more Antoine Semenyo, it seems likely, will soon join Manchester City from Bournemouth for a fee of ¬£65m. Given how well Rayan Cherki and Phil Foden have played from the right this season, it is not immediately obvious why City need him, but the modern game is the modern game, the rammed calendar makes large and flexible squads essential and Pep Guardiola may have some esoteric plan for the Ghanaian anyway. But perhaps what is most striking about the deal is the fee ‚Äì or, more precisely, how little attention it has drawn. English football has become inured to big transfers. The fee feels about right. Semenyo is 25. He has four and a half years left on his contract. He is quick, skilful, intelligent and works hard. He is disciplined, but has the capacity to do the unexpected. Of course a player of his ability costs that much. Yet ¬£65m would make him the third-most expensive player in Bundesliga history. He would be the seventh-most expensive in Serie A history, the 14th-most expensive in La Liga history. Only nine non-English clubs have paid a fee higher than that. Even in Premier League terms, Semenyo sneaks into the top 25. Continue reading...

items.title: Thiago nets hat-trick at Everton as Brentford move into top seven
items.summary: Igor Thiago's hat-trick helped Brentford to a 4-2 win over Everton ‚Äì just the Bees' third away win of the season ‚Äì to move Keith Andrews' side into the Premier League's top seven.

items.title: Van de Ven en scorende Brobbey belangrijk voor Spurs en Sunderland
items.summary: Tottenham Hotspur en Sunderland hebben zondag de punten gedeeld. Micky van de Ven speelde een sleutelrol bij de openingsgoal. Brian Brobbey redde een punt voor de nummer acht van de Premier League.

items.title: 'I'm here to be manager, not coach' - Amorim challenges Man Utd chiefs
items.summary: Ruben Amorim challenges Manchester United's board to let him do his job after Sunday's draw with Leeds, and says he intends to leave in 18 months' time.

items.title: VI Live: Marokko heeft het lastig tegen stug Tanzania
items.summary: In deze VI Live volgen we de hoogtepunten in verschillende competities. Met onder meer aandacht voor Leeds United - Manchester United, Fulham - Liverpool, de Afrika Cup en Real Madrid - Real Betis.

items.title: Fiorentina door goal Kean in blessuretijd eindelijk van laatste plek af
items.summary: Fiorentina heeft zondag de laatste plek in de Serie A verlaten. In de strijd tegen degradatie pakte de ploeg van Paolo Vanoli drie cruciale punten tegen promovendus Cremonese. Daarvoor moesten de fans wel wachten tot de blessuretijd.

items.title: Rodri starts for Man City as managerless Chelsea change five LIVE!
Farke 'disappointed' with draw against Man Utd
items.summary: Leeds manager Daniel Farke says he's "a bit disappointed" with a 1-1 draw against Manchester United, adding "it's not the best performance but good to take a point and move on".

items.title: A tough match in tough conditions - Amorim
items.summary: Manchester United manager Ruben Amorim says "it's hard to find a game where it is satisfying to draw" after their game at Leeds finished 1-1 but says his side played well in "a tough match in tough conditions".

items.title: Matheus Cunha earns Manchester United point as Leeds keep up unbeaten run
items.summary: Few of the near 40,000 that flooded the Elland Road terraces would have cared to admit it given the depths at which one of English football‚Äôs most intense rivalries runs, but it was hard to argue that this was anything but a well-earned point apiece that serves the intentions and ambitions of both Leeds and Manchester United well. On first glance, a draw away at a ¬≠relegation-threatened, newly ¬≠promoted side does little in terms of oozing positivity. But given the fact Ruben Amorim selected a starting lineup with nine defensive-minded players and the visitors were facing a Leeds side now on their longest unbeaten run in the Premier League since 2001, they will view this as a point gained. Continue reading...
